RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 27400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENTRY TIME rated a slim lead well off the rail, came under pressure to draw clear and save some ground on the turn and was steadily handled in the stretch. TAP SECRET gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the five path then dug in to take second later yards. THE ILLUSIONIST gave chase, raced in the four path on the turn then flattened later yards. LION OF THE SEA chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn two deep then weakened approaching mid-stretch. ALWAYS HOPEFUL gave chase, raced near the rail on the turn and gave way in the lane. ROSE'S PEPINO became erratic, showed no early speed and could only close the gap.

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,5p turn,dug in lane,up 2nd later yards

ENTRY.NAME: Entry Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated slim lead,pressured turn,steady handling lane

ENTRY.NAME: The Illusionist
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 24000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Ol der, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCK ROSE took a quick lead and rated the pace inside, drew off at the rail on the turn and won handily. TIMEISGOLDEN dropped off the pace and saved ground, bid leaving the three eighths pole, entered the far turn near the rail but angled to the five path through the turn and settled for second best. SECRET CASTLE came away awkwardly, rounded the first turn about the three path and picked up the chase past the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn and showed little more. MYGIDGETMARIE stalked from the three path the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn then flattened stride. MIND YOUR OWN settled off the rail on the first turn, bid nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail and weakened in the lane. TUNSTALL stalked two deep on the first turn, gave chase past the seven sixteenths pole then faded at the rail on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Timeisgolden
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped off pace,bid 3/8,angled 5p far turn,settled 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Rock Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Shake and Bake Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead,rated inside,drew off rail turn,handily

ENTRY.NAME: Mind Your Own
ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward break,3p 1st turn,chased 7/16,3p far turn,little in lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAD SWANN set a pressured pace, raced near the rail on the turn and held on under steady handling. MALIBU YEARS gave chase through the backstretch, raced off the rail on the turn and finished well at the outside withers of the winner. LIGHTNIN QUEEN chased, raced in the five path on the turn and showed little in the lane. SHOTGUN MARGARET gave chase, entered the turn about the three path, angled to the five path approaching the head of the lane and finished evenly to pass rivals. WAY OF APPEAL chased inside, raced near the rail on the turn then weakened. PARALLAX VIEW gave chase from well back, raced at the rail on the turn and ran evenly in the stretch. QUEEN PIERA gave chase then faded in the three path on the turn. BEA'S LEGEND steadied on the chute.

ENTRY.NAME: Mad Swann
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,rail turn,held on driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 13700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 28, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,5 00, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRINKWITHTHESTARS took the lead at the half mile pole and rated the early pace, came under pressure at the rail on the turn and held on well under steady handling. GRAND FIBER angled in on the chute then gave chase through the backstretch, raced off the rail on the turn and finished well. DARK HEDGES chased inside, raced near the rail on the turn and finished well. BIG HAMBONE chased outside, raced in the six path on the turn and showed little in the lane. WIDGET FACTORY chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the four path and weakened in the stretch. PROTA chased, raced in the three path on the turn then weakened. NOMO RON was shuffled back on the chute, suffered a fatal injury leaving the seven sixteenths pole and had to be euthanized.

ENTRY.NAME: Drinkwiththestars
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace,pressured rail turn,held well driving

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Hedges
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and TEC Racing (Elliott S Logan)

ENTRY.NAME: Prota
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Fiber
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in chute,chased,off rail turn,finished well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAVY BAND was hustled from between horses and took the lead leaving the half mile pole, came under pressure nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the turn at the rail and held well under steady handling. RUNAWAY BEAUTY gave chase inside, raced two deep on the turn, dueled to a clear second inside the sixteenth pole and finished well. VICE ON ICE chased outside, raced in the six path on the turn, lugged in through the lane and came along for third later yards. REMY'S HOTSHOT chased through the backstretch, raced near the rail on the turn and flattened in the lane. MAKANI gave chase, rounded the turn in the three and four paths and showed little more. GIRLS PERFUME chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn off the rail and had little left. QUINN ELIA gave chase then flattened in the five path on the turn. MISS INTENSITY and BEVERLY'SACTINUP saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Navy Band
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled up,rated pace,pressured 3/8,rail turn,held well driving

ENTRY.NAME: Vice On Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside,6p turn,lugged in,along 3rd later yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (Races Wher e Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PINNACLE REEF gave chase and improved at the rail on the turn, angled out approaching mid-stretch and got up with a late surge. DE'S CASTLE chased and raced close off the rail on the turn and dug in determinedly to take the nod for second while outfinished for the win in the final strides. BOP ZAPPER was hustled to the front leaving the half mile pole and set a pressured pace, contested the edge nearest the rail on the turn and dug in gamely through the stretch, though, ceded the nod for second in the final yards. ROCKING TO HOME chased inside, raced near the rail on the turn and ran evenly to mid-stretch before flattening stride. JUST JUBA chased outside, rounded the turn about the four path and flattened in the lane. TALKING TEDDY pressured the early pace, rounded the turn about the three path and weakened in the lane. YDOUHAVETOBESOMEAN saved ground. RIVER ROYALE R V F gave chase through the backstretch then weakened in the five path on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Bop Zapper
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled up,set pressured pace,rail turn,game lane,ceded nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Pinnacle Reef
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,improved rail turn,angled out 1/16,up with late surge

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 88. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE AUGUST 31, 2021 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISSIONSNINETYNINE broke awkwardly and outward and made contact with Fearnought then moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure leaving the seven sixteenths pole, contested the edge nearest the rail on the far turn and dug in under determined handling to hold on. AUBURN MILL tapered in and stalked two deep, challenged leaving the seven sixteenths pole, contested at a close disadvantage off the rail on the far turn and dug in gamely to secure second. NEVER COMPROMISE stalked from the two and three paths, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the four path and was outfinished in the stretch duel for second. GOLDEN APPEAL broke inward and made contact with FEARNOUGHT, then settled in the four path the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn, eased out into the lane and flattened stride. The latter was pinched back at the break then saved ground just off the early pace, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced two deep on the far turn and flattened in the lane. MACHEN'S RIDGE stalked from the four path on the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole but flattened stride in the four path on the far turn. WINDSOR'S TRACKER rated close to the early pace inside, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole but weakened at the rail on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Windsor's Tracker
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close early,chased 7/16,weakened rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Missionsninetynine
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward,bumped break,rated pace,edge rail turn,held on driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 12700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 28, 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered F or $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPER GARNER gave chase inside and dueled at mostly even terms leaving the five sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the turn, dueled clear nearing mid-stretch and held on with steady encouragement. BIG DADDY D R gave chase and steadily progressed, entered the turn at the rail, eased out midway through the turn and finished well to take second the final strides while gaining on the winner. BE BE BOP set a pressured pace the opening quarter mile, was met and dueled at mostly even terms from the five sixteenths pole, rounded the turn off the rail but dropped back toward mid-stretch and flattened stride later yards. ZIGGY MON chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn in the five path and flattened stride widest. GOT FLOFFY chased outside, rounded the turn in the six path and flattened stride. BUCKED TOOTH chased inside, raced at the rail on the turn and finished evenly to pass rivals in the lane. FIRST NAVY ADMIRAL became fractious in the gate, gave chase inside, raced at the rail on the turn and weakened. PAPA TONY gave chase, rounded the turn about the five path and weakened in the lane. WIZARD OF ODDS was not a factor. HELL'S KITTEN lacked speed while racing wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Garner
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside,even terms from 5/16,rail turn,held on driving

ENTRY.NAME: Be Be Bop
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,even terms off rail turn,flattened later yards

ENTRY.NAME: Big Daddy D R
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,rail turn,eased out mid turn,up 2nd late,gaining
